metadata.source_file: dao\正统道藏洞真部\神符类\太上洞真经洞章符.txt

full_translation:
**The Supreme Cavern Perfection Scripture of Cavern Talismans**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Cavern Perfection Scripture of Cavern Talismans*. Author unknown. One scroll. Base text from *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity* (Zhengtong Daozang), Cavern Perfection Division, Spirit Talisman Category.

---

### **The Cavern Talismans of the Supreme Cavern Perfection Scripture**

The Cavern Talismans are as follows:

The Three Qi of the Supreme transform into divine talismans, named the *Boundless Cavern Talismans of the Three Origins*. They command the Six Jia, mobilize the Five Phases, govern separation and reunion, reverse death and restore life. They dispel the Three Ghosts and purify the Five Spirits.

The Five Spirits are also called the Five Corpses; the Three Ghosts are also called the Three Worms. Worms and corpses are alternate names—when the spirits are disordered and the ghosts chaotic, they dwell within the human body, inciting evil deeds.

On auspicious days and propitious hours, one reports to the Mysterious Bureau. The Supreme issues a mandate, ordering all celestial deities to seize and restrain the corpse-ghosts, impeaching human transgressions. The Director of Destinies examines and calculates, demoting the foolish and promoting the worthy.

The worthy ascend to study, purifying themselves through fasting and cultivation. They abandon evil and practice goodness, restraining the corpse-ghosts. They eradicate baleful qi and draw in auspicious spirits.

Those who receive and wear the talismans must hold them in mind and contemplate them within. The Great Unity descends with the divine name *Inscribed in the Register of Life*, forever freeing one from the sorrows of the Nine Earths and eternally preserving the joy of the Three Clarities.

---

### **Declaration for the Cavern Talisman**

On the [day] of the [month] in the year of [Tai Sui], at the hour of [time], your humble servant, [name], of [prefecture, county, village], [personal name], declares:

By the threads of former lives, blessings have infused my essence. Revolving through the Nine Heavens, my fortune flows unbroken. Having attained the *Mysterious Cavern Scripture* and refined the subtle arts, I fear the Three Worms remain unpurged and the Five Corpses bring illness.

I reverently request the secret Cavern Talismans to extinguish the corpse-worms, erase death and inscribe life, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the Supreme Perfected.

**The Three Corpses:** Upper Corpse, Middle Corpse, Lower Corpse.
**The Five Corpses:** Green Corpse, Red Corpse, White Corpse, Black Corpse, Yellow Corpse.
May the Three Corpses and Five Corpses all descend into the Yellow Springs.

I ascend to the Azure Heavens to preserve long life, joy without end, and dwell as a Heavenly King for generation upon generation.

---

**Secret Incantation for the Five Corpses (to be recited silently each morning):**

Left: Wu Ying. Right: Bai Yuan. Center: Director of Destinies. Above: Great Unity. Below: Tao Kang.
Bind the spirit and essence, gather the hun and po, extend the years of life, stabilize the hundred spirits, augment the essence and qi, erase the mark of death, rectify the name of life.

The Five Elders transmit the talismanic registers; the Five Numinous Ones present the Cavern Talismans.
Upholding me, they wander carefree, feasting in the Jade Capital.

---

**Secret Incantation of the Five Numinous Ones (to be recited silently each evening):**

---

### **Five Vital Talismanic Strategies**

**First:** *Talismanic Strategy for Preserving the Spirit and Prolonging Life.*
On one’s life-day, at midday, write in cinnabar on green paper, making two copies. At midnight, enter a chamber, complete the visualization, face one’s life-direction, and ingest one copy. Cut the talisman from top to bottom along the black dots. Place the left half into the stove fire and the right half into well water. Regularly performing this on one’s life-day ensures the Celestial Emperor records one’s life contract.

**Second:** *Talismanic Strategy for Undying Flight to Immortality.*
On one’s life-day at dawn, write in green ink on white paper and ingest while facing east.

**Third:** *Talismanic Strategy for Eradicating Corpses and Stabilizing Life.*
On one’s life-day at midday, write in cinnabar on white paper and ingest one copy while facing south.

**Fourth:** *Talismanic Strategy for Recording Years and Stabilizing Form.*
On one’s life-day at dusk, write in cinnabar on white paper and ingest while facing one’s life-direction.

**Fifth:** *Talismanic Strategy for Restraining the Hun-Po and Treasuring Life.*
On the life-month, life-day, and life-hour, write in cinnabar on white paper and ingest while facing north. If the life-month, day, or hour is unknown, ingest on the day of *wu-wu* at midday.

The Five Registers and Five Talismans must be ingested according to the method and worn while traveling. The term "strategy" denotes the talisman; cultivation depends on precision. When names are inscribed in the Jade Calendar, the Five Spirits descend with numinosity, ascending together to the Mysterious Ultimate.

---

**General Instructions for Incantations, Refinement, Qi Regulation, Spirit Pacification, and Demon Repulsion:**

Before visualization, knock the teeth and rouse one’s might, alerting and admonishing within and without. First, silently recite the *Incantation for Eradicating Evil*:

*"The Yellow Center wields qi to sever the root of demons,
Scrutinizing and restraining strong essence, cutting off the old fiend.
The Supreme issues a mandate from the Supreme Chamber,
Urging the Northern Emperor to hasten to the Jade Palace.
Reverently bearing the mighty decree, proclaiming to the Demon Kings,
The Nine Qi billow and clash with destiny.
The secret Jade Texts flourish in perfection,
The Three Heavens revolve in brightness, the Six Heavens in completion.
How worthy!"*

After reciting the secret incantation, proceed to chant the scriptures. Otherwise, myriad evils will assail the superior adept. Diligently practicing this ensures demonic spirits respect and protect.

If ingesting, carrying, or wearing talismans, and failing to recite the incantations, simply silently recite this one before ingesting or wearing as desired.

---

### **Five Might and Five Martial Talismans**

Wearing these extends years and augments destiny, subdues ghosts and overawes humans, commanding all respect and restraint. Ghosts, demons, and hundredfold spirits dare not assail one, ensuring long life and auspiciousness.

**Supreme Great Spirit, wielding serpents to halt poison.**
With might, it subdues malevolent spirits, sparing the true and upright.

*(Talismanic script originally missing.)*

**Supreme, Divine Tiger, Five Martial Mighty Essence.**
Crushing demons and subduing evil, guarding and protecting the loyal and good.

*(Talismanic script originally missing.)*

**Supreme Mysterious Elder, Dragon-Serpent King.**
Mighty spirit shakes and solemnizes; hidden and obscure, it is all-encompassing.
Evil persons and malevolent ghosts all fear and submit.

*(Talismanic script originally missing.)*

**Supreme Heavenly Worthy, grasping the handle of the Dipper.**
Where it points, destruction follows; where it descends, misfortune befalls.
Aiding the good and punishing the evil, descending to receive the pure and true.
Five Numinous Ones attend in guard; divine officials array in formation.
The recipient must visualize and remember clearly, never forgetting.
After three years, they will personally behold the august deities.

In the year of [X] under the reign of the Great Year-Star, in the [X] month at the hour of the Mother of [X], in the state, commandery, county, village, and hamlet of [X], [male/female] of [Name], aged [X] years.

Invoking the Talisman of the Boundless Grand Marshal and the Five Numinous Five Martial Spirits, wear it to repel weapons.
Entering water, one shall not encounter flood dragons or serpents; entering mountains, one shall not meet tigers, wolves, or venomous vipers.
Evil persons upon seeing me shall have their hearts crushed and gallbladders shattered.
Ghosts and spirits upon seeing me shall prostrate and dare not rise.
The talisman smites demonic altars and shatters temples, severing the Six Heavens.
All remaining spirits, myriad specters, and malevolent entities within the villages, communities, and domains—upon seeing this talisman borne by me—shall come forth to pay homage and bow.
Bearing its might and martial power, one traverses the world; all perverse and evil forces shall be seized and subdued.

Respectfully upholding and enacting the true talisman, all as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

**Talisman of the Five Numinous Five Martial Spirits:**
Wear it; inscribe its form but do not inscribe the right-hand annotations.

**Talisman of the Great Unity for Upholding Life and Prolonging Years:**
As follows.

In the year of [X] under the reign of the Great Year-Star, on the [X] day of the [X] month at the hour of [X], in the state, commandery, county, village, and hamlet of [X], [male/female] of [Name].
Devoted to the Dao and delighting in life, a descendant of the Most High.
As recorded in the Jade Register of Immortals, under the Northern Dipper’s Seven Stars.
In these times of peril, with the world beset by evil and malevolent forces,
Should they assail one’s person, I fear I may not safely pass through.
I hereby receive the Talisman of the Great Unity for Upholding Life and Prolonging Years, to guard and protect myself.
After receiving the talisman, in all movements, comings, and goings, the bearer shall know no distress.
Demonic specters, ghostly thieves—upon seeing the talisman—shall immediately prostrate and hide.
The true officials of the land shall all escort and welcome, none daring to disobey.

Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the talisman’s original decree and the statutes and commands!

Thus concludes the *Dongzhen Scripture* and the talismanic chapters of the *Dongzhang*.

chunks.original_text: 太上洞真经洞章符 经名：太上洞真经洞章符。 撰人不详。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部神符类。 太上洞真经洞章符 洞章符如左 太上三气，化为神符，号曰：三元无量洞章。 制命六甲，运使五行。 率离还合，却死来生。 消除三鬼，涤荡五神。 五神一曰五尸，三鬼一曰三虫。 虫、尸互名，参神乱鬼。 在人身者，劝为恶事。 良辰吉日，上白玄司。 太上有命，勑诸天神。 领摄尸鬼，劾人罪愆。 司命考算，黜愚陟贤。 贤者上学，清斋治身。 舍恶习善，拘制鬼尸。 除灭凶气，引纳吉神。 受符佩带，存思在心。 太一降神名上生籍，永免九地之忧，长保三清之乐也。 洞章符告文 某号某年太岁某某月日时，粪土臣妾某州县乡里，某人姓名。 先身乘条，庆染来质。 轮转九天，流祚不绝。 得参玄洞之经，陶炼微妙之术。 恐三虫未荡，五尸奏疾。 谨请洞章秘符，灭落尸虫，削死上生，一如太真朋科律令。 三尸：上尸、中尸、下尸。 五尸：青尸、赤尸、白尸、黑尸、黄尸。 三尸、五尸，俱入黄泉。 吾升青天保长生，乐未央，世世居天王。 右五尸秘咒朝朝密言之 左无英，右白元，中司命，上太一，下桃康。 结精神，摄魂魄，延年命，定百神，益精气，削死目，正生名。 五老度符籍，五灵奉洞章。 提携吾与我，逍遥宴玉京。 右五灵密咒，夕夕密言之。 生策五符 右第一，保神长生符策。 本命日日中时朱书青纸作二枚夜半，入一室存思毕，向本命服一枚，以刀从上下黑点处中被之。 左一半内灶火中，右半内井水中。 本命常如此，帝记命券也。 右第二，不死飞仙符策。 本命日平旦，青书白纸，向东服之。 右第三，灭尸安命符策。 本命日日中，朱书白纸一枚，向南服。 右第四，记年安形符策。 本命日日暮，朱书白纸，向本命服之。 右第五，制套魄宝命符策。 本命之月，本命之日，本命之时，朱书白纸，北向服之。 不知生月日时，以戊午日日中时服之。 五籍五符，服之依法，行则佩之。 存号曰策，修习在精。 名书玉历，五神降灵，同升玄极也中凡咒诵炼一气安神却魔。 临自存思，叩齿振威，警诫内外。 先密诵灭邪咒曰： 黄中策气斩妖宗，察制强精断邪翁。 太上有命太上房，急召北帝诣玉宫。 奉承威令宣魔王，九气蓊郁与命冲。 秘藏玉文方就隆，三天运明六天运终。 贤者哉。 密咒毕，乃诵咏诸经。 不然，则众邪干人上士。 勤习之，则魔神敬护。 若服符、行符、佩滞，策不诵诸咒，直密咒此，便服佩随意也。 五威五武符，佩之延年益算，威鬼伏人，一切敬抑。 鬼魅百精，不敢干人，长生吉祥。 右太上大神，执蛇止毒。 以威凶邪，不害真正。 原阙符篆。 右太上，神虎，五武雄精。 摧魔伏恶，卫护忠良。 原阙符篆。 右无上玄老，龙蛇之王。 威神振肃，幽隐必周。 凶人恶鬼，莫不畏伏。 原阙符篆。 右太一天尊，把持斗柄。 所指者破，所临者状。 佑善罚恶，降接清真。 五灵侍卫，神官罗陈。 受者存之，谛忆勿忘。 三年之后，亲睹尊神也。

chunks.original_text: 某号年太岁某某月母时，某州郡县乡里，男女姓名，年若干岁。 请无极大都督五威五武神符，佩之辟兵。 入水不逢蚊龙沁入山不逢虎狼蛇虺。 恶人见我。 摧心失胆。 鬼神见我，伏不敢起。 诛符破庙，断截六天。 余号群精万魅，所在里社邑域，符传见我，皆来谒拜。 荷乘威武，横行天下，众邪挚伏。 谨奉行真符，一如太上老君律令。 右五威五武符，佩之，写图勿题右注也。 太一扶命延年神符，如左。 某号年太岁某某月日时，某州郡县乡里，男女姓名。 好道乐生，太上子孙。 某属神仙玉历，北斗七星君。 值今时难，世恶群邪。 互行其身，恐不全度。 请受太一，扶命延年神符，以自防保。 肉人受符之后，行来出入，无有忧患。 魍魉鬼贼，见符皆即伏匿。 土地真官，皆共送迎，不得有违。 急急如神符本旨律令。 太上洞真经洞章符竟
chunks.translated_text:
In the year of [X] under the reign of the Great Year-Star, in the [X] month at the hour of the Mother of [X], in the state, commandery, county, village, and hamlet of [X], [male/female] of [Name], aged [X] years.

Invoking the Talisman of the Boundless Grand Marshal and the Five Numinous Five Martial Spirits, wear it to repel weapons.
Entering water, one shall not encounter flood dragons or serpents; entering mountains, one shall not meet tigers, wolves, or venomous vipers.
Evil persons upon seeing me shall have their hearts crushed and gallbladders shattered.
Ghosts and spirits upon seeing me shall prostrate and dare not rise.
The talisman smites demonic altars and shatters temples, severing the Six Heavens.
All remaining spirits, myriad specters, and malevolent entities within the villages, communities, and domains—upon seeing this talisman borne by me—shall come forth to pay homage and bow.
Bearing its might and martial power, one traverses the world; all perverse and evil forces shall be seized and subdued.

Respectfully upholding and enacting the true talisman, all as decreed by the Most High Lord Lao.

**Talisman of the Five Numinous Five Martial Spirits:**
Wear it; inscribe its form but do not inscribe the right-hand annotations.

**Talisman of the Great Unity for Upholding Life and Prolonging Years:**
As follows.

In the year of [X] under the reign of the Great Year-Star, on the [X] day of the [X] month at the hour of [X], in the state, commandery, county, village, and hamlet of [X], [male/female] of [Name].
Devoted to the Dao and delighting in life, a descendant of the Most High.
As recorded in the Jade Register of Immortals, under the Northern Dipper’s Seven Stars.
In these times of peril, with the world beset by evil and malevolent forces,
Should they assail one’s person, I fear I may not safely pass through.
I hereby receive the Talisman of the Great Unity for Upholding Life and Prolonging Years, to guard and protect myself.
After receiving the talisman, in all movements, comings, and goings, the bearer shall know no distress.
Demonic specters, ghostly thieves—upon seeing the talisman—shall immediately prostrate and hide.
The true officials of the land shall all escort and welcome, none daring to disobey.

Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the talisman’s original decree and the statutes and commands!

Thus concludes the *Dongzhen Scripture* and the talismanic chapters of the *Dongzhang*.
